New job and other updates

Tags: ACEware, Java, Eclipse

I have accepted a job at ACEware. I will be working on a web application using java and Eclipse. I am pretty excited to start working for ACEware and expanding my skills in the area of web development.

Updates on personal projects:

I have started getting a custom admin for edBlog. I currently have the ability to make a post and most of the basic admin functionality written I just need to implement a way to automatically “urlify” my titles. I haven’t implemented the new features like uploading a picture, the ability to comment, or using markdown but that will be coming soon.
